entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
